about_the_game:
• Ability to choose Winter course theme with its snowy landscape. Trees are bare with branch tops covered in snow, and ponds are frozen over. This theme supports all existing levels.
  • 9 new levels playable in all modes and seasons.


  • Three christmas themed customizations including Candy ball, Elf hat, and Bobble hat which are timed unlocks for playing around Christmas.
detailed_description:
• Ability to choose Winter course theme with its snowy landscape. Trees are bare with branch tops covered in snow, and ponds are frozen over. This theme supports all existing levels.
  • 9 new levels playable in all modes and seasons.


  • Three christmas themed customizations including Candy ball, Elf hat, and Bobble hat which are timed unlocks for playing around Christmas.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® 700 Series (Maxwell) / AMD Radeon™ RX 400 Series / AMD Ryzen™ Processors with Radeon™ Vega Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Medium".
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Highest".

name: Golfing in Aether - Winter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® 700 Series (Maxwell) / AMD Radeon™ RX 400 Series / AMD Ryzen™ Processors with Radeon™ Vega Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Medium".
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Highest".

short_description: The second free expansion to Golfing in Aether, introducing a snowy winter landscape along with several new levels.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
